required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase ll Study of IMM-124E for Patients With Non-alcoholic Steatohepatitis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase ll, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of IMM-124E for Patients With Non-alcoholic Steatohepatitis.

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the safety and preliminary efficacy of two dose levels of IMM-124E in reducing liver fat and/or serum alanine aminotransaminase (ALT) compared with placebo.

detailed_description.textblock:
Subjects who provide voluntary written informed consent will be screened for eligibility. Subjects meeting all of the inclusion and none of the exclusion criteria will be eligible to participate.
Eligible subjects will be randomized at the Baseline visit to receive one of the three study treatments three times daily for a period of 24 weeks. Each subject will return to the study clinic for assessment and required study procedures on Day 7, 14 and 28 and every 4 weeks thereafter until Week 24.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse events per arm/group

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage Fat Content of the Liver
primary_outcome.description: Mean change from Baseline in Percentage Fat Content of the Liver measured by Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) at Week 24
Number of patients with treatment-related adverse events

secondary_outcome.description: Mean change in Systolic Blood Pressure
Mean change in Pulse Rate from baseline to week 24
Change in Diastolic Blood Pressure
Mean change in Respiratory Rate from baseline to week 24
Mean change from Baseline in Serum Alanine Aminotransaminase (ALT) at Week 24
Peak serum concentration (Cmax) of IMM-124E
Minimum serum concentration (Cmin) of IMM-124E

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration Time Curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: Area Under the Concentration Time Curve (AUC) of IMM-124E. Time points at which data were collected: baseline pre-dose, week 4, week 12 and week 24.
Elimination Half Life (T1/2) of IMM-124E
Change from Baseline of Body Mass Index (BMI) at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of Waist Circumference at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of Waist:Hip Ratio at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of Hemoglobin(HB)A1C at 24 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Homeostatic Model Assessment of Insulin Resistance (HOMA-IR)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline of Homeostatic Model Assessment of Insulin Resistance (HOMA-IR) at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of Total Cholesterol at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of Triglycerides at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of Low Density Lipoprotein (LDL) at 24 weeks
Change from Baseline of High Density Lipoprotein (HDL) at 24 weeks
Mean change from Baseline of serum ALT
Mean change from Baseline of Serum AST
Mean change from Baseline of Bilirubin
Mean change from Baseline of Albumin
Mean change from Baseline of Gamma Glutamyl Transpeptidase (GGT)
Number of patients with ALT within the normal reference range at Week 24 (defined a <19 IU/L for women and <30 IU/L for men)

other_outcome.description: The percentage of subjects reporting at least 15% reduction in LPS, from baseline to Week 24

other_outcome.measure: Regulatory T Cells (FoxP3+ CD25-CD4+) in Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells
other_outcome.description: Change in percent of FoxP3+ CD25-CD4+ cells in Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells
Number of participants with measurable differences in gut microbiome constituents post-treatment
Serum Concentrations of Lipopolysaccharide (LPS) (ng/mL) levels and change from Baseline
Mean Serum Concentrations of C-Reactive Protein (CRP) at week 24
The proportion of subjects with significant reduction of CK-18 (≥ 15%) between IMP 1200mg group to placebo.
Change from Run-in to Post-treatment in serum concentration of human Adiponectin.
Mean Change from baseline to week 24 of serum concentration of cytokine IL-6
Mean change from baseline to week 24 of Serum concentration of Cytokine IL-12p70
Mean Change from baseline to week 24 of serum concentration of IFN-gamma

other_outcome.measure: Serum Concentration of Tumor Necrosis Factor Alpha (TNF-α)
other_outcome.description: Mean Change from baseline to week 24 of serum concentration of TNF-α
Mean Change from baseline to week 24 of serum concentration of GLP-1

other_outcome.measure: Regulatory T Cells (FoxP3+CD25-CD8+) in Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells
other_outcome.description: Change in percent of FoxP3+CD25-CD8+ cells in Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells

Matching placebo, three times daily, orally

outcome.title: Serum Concentrations of Lipopolysaccharide (LPS)
outcome.description: The percentage of subjects reporting at least 15% reduction in LPS, from baseline to Week 24
outcome.population: excluding subjects with < 250 LPS at baseline (comparing 1200mg IMP group to Placebo group). PP population, excluding outliers sites. this Outcome Measure was pre-specified to be assessed in the 1200mg and Placebo Arms/Groups *only*

outcome.title: Serum Concentrations of CK-18 Fragments
outcome.description: The proportion of subjects with significant reduction of CK-18 (≥ 15%) between IMP 1200mg group to placebo.
outcome.population: FAS population, excluding outlier sites. this Outcome Measure was pre-specified to be assessed in the 1200mg and Placebo Arms/Groups *only*

measurement_list.measurement: only 1 participant's data analyzed in 600mg arm.

reported_events.time_frame: 28 weeks after participant received first dose
reported_events.desc: The adverse event information collected in the clinical study is collected based on the adverse event definition of ''Results Data Element Definitions for Adverse Events''. The adverse events data was collected based on physician's assessments, laboratory assessments, subjects reporting and questionnaires.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There IS an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
